input_text:
Job Title: System Analyst

Location: Overland Park, KS

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology, Production

Description:
Job Number: 24-00709

Use your skills where innovative technology solutions begin. Eclaro is looking for a System Analyst for our client in Overland Park, KS.

Eclaro’s client is a leading consumer products company with a global presence. If you’re up to the challenge, then take a chance at this rewarding opportunity!

Responsibilities:

Owner of new hire equipment assignments. Based on new user requests, complete systems set-up for users. Field and troubleshoot Call Center systems related questions and issues, to include monitoring chats and tickets. Coordinate review of system updates entered in the request system. Gain alignment and prioritization for approved projects. Coordinate set-up, system, and business testing. Keep stakeholders informed with timely communications. Coordinate and complete systems testing projects. Partner internally to transfer systems knowledge and changes to enable production of training materials. Input functional changes to the systems and work with IT business partners for ensure proper execution. 

Qualifications:

Proficiency in Excel, SQL, or other related data/system tools, 1-year prior call center experience Demonstrated experience in testing and/ or administration of customer service application technologies. Google/Microsoft Suite proficiency (i.e., Sheets, Slides, Docs) Ability to understand technical terminology and processes to translate to the business. Ability to translate business needs into technology requirements. Supporting system implementation and upgrade projects Proficiency in Excel, SQL, or other related data/system tools 1-year prior call center experience Proficiency in understanding business problems and opportunities

If hired, you will enjoy the following Eclaro Benefits:

401k Retirement Savings Plan administered by Merrill LynchCommuter Check Pretax Commuter BenefitsEligibility to purchase Medical, Dental & Vision Insurance through Eclaro

If interested, you may contact:

Chantal Alcantara

mary.alcantara@eclaro.com

332-206-0754

Equal Opportunity Employer: Eclaro values diversity and does not discriminate based on Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, National Origin, Age, Genetic Information, Disability, Protected Veteran Status, or any other legally protected group status.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
